entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is described as a student who is wiping his face and staring at a spot. He is mentioned as saying 'It came from over there!'.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is described as blundering forward with long arms outstretched like a zombie. He is trying to see who threw a stick at him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as dodging around Crabbe and picking up a stick to throw it at Crabbe's back. He is also mentioned as laughing silently when Crabbe does a pirouette in midair.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as the only person Crabbe can see, and he starts towards Ron thinking he threw the stick. Harry sticks out his leg to stop him.

relationships.description: Malfoy points at Harry's head and yells 'AAARGH!'.
Crabbe starts towards Ron thinking he threw the stick.
